title: NA LCS Spring Split Week 2 Day 2 MEGATHREAD
body:
IMT vs C9 Blue / P1 vs Envy 

TSM vs Liquid / Echo Fox vs dignitas

Immortals vs C9 Blue will be a real good game to watch. Cloud9 looks really good right now, but I think Immortals will take a game off of them. P1 will steamroll Envy I think. As for TSM vs Liquid, that could go either way. Dig will streamroll Echo Fox since they're dead last. 

Also someone else will have to do the LCS thread tomorrow because I wont be here :( 

twitch stream IMT vs C9 / TSM vs Liquid : https://www.twitch.tv/nalcs1

twitch stream P1 vs Envy / EF vs Dig : https://www.twitch.tv/nalcs2

youtube lcs1 : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5ExokQ6GCO8
